title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Singapore 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2016 to 2018, slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019, gradually increasing from 2019 to 2021, and lastly roughly constant from 2021 to 2024.
The line drastically decreased by 5.7 times from Year 2018 to 2019, and lastly, increased by 1.8 times from Year 2019 to 2020.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 3.7 was reached at Year 2017
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 0.55 was reported at Year 2019
